sub_title: Operations Senior Officer at CIB - Commercial International Bank
summary:
Dina is a confident, dedicated and committed Senior Banking Professional. I started my career in retail commercial banking in 2006 and in positions of increasing responsibilities and duties. Ms. Dina is highly-motivated and results orientated manager who is able to convert plans into reality considering the bank vision and goals.  
I am versatile and multitasker. The duties I have performed required a wide range of diverse knowledge, abilities and skills. This includes profound banking knowledge in both Customer Services & Operations. I also have deep ability to apply bank policies and procedures according to CBE. Technically, I am a professional user of MS Office Applications. I am also bilingual; I am a competent user of English and also use French fairly well. I have gained profound experience in translation and interpretation throughout my university education and my experience. Additionally, I am highly skilled when it comes to communication and negotiation. I have an outstanding leadership experience in teamwork environment. As an asset, I can provide vital information as needed in decision–making. I am exceptionally detail-oriented with strong reporting skills which can be a plus.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 16525, 'name': 'CIB Egypt', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQENCEziPXxnfQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1604490577573?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=A3N4aXypV9hr6ZBsdvtJEJR-0zdJik__ykccSnpko3w', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/cibegypt/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Egypt', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'CIB Egypt', 'description': 'Operational Functions: 
 Ensure efficient management of the cash. 
-  Handle trade and non-trade finance transactions. 
 Introduce alternative channels to customers to reduce traffic at branch to meet the standard offloading rate.
 Collect data for daily & monthly reporting.
 Ensure that AML reports are in place to mitigate any potential risk.  
Managerial Functions:
 Review the performance of the staff to determine strengths and weaknesses for training and development programs and better performance.
 Implement control as per the bank SOP,s and compliance regulations.
 Maintain an open communication channels with team members.
Reporting:
 Be attentive to any possible frauds and risks .
 Prepare Financial & Non-Financial Risk Events Report.
 Report any deviations or exceptions in monthly MER report.
Policies, Processes and Procedures:
 Follow all relevant policies, processes, standard operating procedures and instructions for control.
 Maintain regular consistent and professional attendance, punctuality, personal appearance, and adherence to relevant health & safety procedures.
Day-to-day operations:
 Follow the day-to-day operations related to own jobs in the concerned department to ensure accuracy of cash balances.
 Ensure that all end of day reports are accurately checked and any discrepancy is rectified.
Compliance:
 Comply with all relevant CBE regulations, banking laws, AML regulations and internal CIB policies and code of conduct.
People Management: 
	Set priorities to subordinates, distribute workload, set time frame for implementation and follow up on performance.
 Transfer knowledge, guidance and act as role model for staff and subordinate to create second line staff.
 Ensure the effective achievement of staff objectives through careful objectives setting, managing performance, developing, and motivating staff, assisting career development, providing formal and informal feedback and appraisal in order to maximize overall performance.', 'title': 'Operations Senior Officer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Egypt', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'CIB Egypt', 'description': "Contribute in increasing CIB market share when achieve assigned branch targets in both 
        assets and liabilities as per agreed business plan. 
	
Apply superior quality service to keep CIB image when work closely with the service controller 
        to ensure branch maintains a higher service quality score .
	
Manage the sales team performance, develop a business plan 
	
Tackle areas for improvement mentioned in the monthly service quality report and mystery 
        shopping report and making sure are closed in a timely manner.
	
Analyze and have a deep understanding of clients, portfolios including developing, maintaining 
        and updating customer profiles and current and future needs.
	
Improve relation in line with branch plan for all products by ensuring that all customers needs 
        are identified and proper solutions and offers provided in timely manner.
	
Ensure providing superior service and solving customers, problems/complaints immediately 
        and maintain strong relations with prime customers.
	
Review performance of employees to determine strengths and weakness and ensure provision 
        of adequate training and development programs to enhance and upgrade their capabilities to 
        perform at the required standards.
	
Participate in sourcing and attracts qualified candidates and ensure they are properly 
        familiarized with the bank, its products and services before they assume their full positions.
	
Adhere to AML Procedures & CBE Regulations.
	
Ensure staff awareness of bank's code of conduct, CIB internal related policies and 
        procedures, AML laws and secrecy law to ensure full compliance.
	
Operate within the approved guidelines of the banks, published SOPs as well as the zone's 
        approved strategy, processes and service level agreements.
	
Perform any additional related tasks as assigned.", 'title': 'SSO - Sales & Service Officer', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'CIB Egypt', 'description': "Provide the information inquiries about various banking products,   accounts or services to the  customers in an effective and efficient manner.

Interact with customers through a variety of means-either in person or by telephone to help them selecting the product or service which would be suitable for their needs.

Identify cross-sell opportunities during customer interaction to achieve the business plan.

Solicit customers’ feedback and identify problem trends to assist customers with their enquiries   and requirements to provide the appropriate counsel.

Coordinate with Retail Operations, Card Production, Branches and other units to resolve any 
customer/s problem/s for improvement actions.

Consistently deliver quality service to our customers to achieve total customer satisfaction. 

Maintain a database of information of all the prepared records about the customers

Continuously develop knowledge and information about competitors, activities and communicate this to my Head / supervisors.

Conversant with all the technicalities, legal regulations, and standard operating practices  employed by standard banks while dealing with customers 

Manage and control costs and all factors affecting the profitable performance of the branch according to the bank's requirements.

Introduce and promote channels to customers to reduce traffic in the branch.
Upgrade and update the regular changes to a customer’s profile or account information.", 'title': 'Sales Service Representative', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'CIB Egypt', 'description': 'Proper and timely handling and executing customers, requests (stop payment requests, external signature verification…etc).

Reduce the number of outstanding security items I managed in the branch (Cr. Cards, Dr. Cards, Cheque Books, Pins…etc) and follow up for their delivery.

Process the Audit Confirmations, Customers Accounts Statements, Bank Relationship, Balance, Liability, Clearance, Salary Certificates…etc

Insure accurate reconciliation and daily balancing of security items traced in the registers with zero errors.

Execute manual tickets related to customer services area.

Placing stop payment, legal blocking, overall check to close accounts and their procedures.

Assist the Operation Supervisor to level out the customers,  complaints.

Prepare the Customer Services Monthly Proofs.', 'title': 'Sales Representative', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'CIB Egypt', 'description': None, 'title': 'Customer Service Representative', 'employment_type': None}]}]
